name: "Totable" - Turquoise Elephants
description:
This Yarn Pop is perfect for carrying all your projects, from socks to sweaters, as well as your smaller Yarn Pop’s. 

With a removable and adjustable strap, you can make it fit your shoulder perfectly and inside you will find three pockets for carrying your phone, needles, notions and anything else you may need.  While carrying the "Totable" you will find that the angle is perfect for retrieving things or knitting while you walk.  

Three grommets across the front provide a fun detail along with functionality (like headphones while in transit) and the large tooth zipper across the top keeps everything safe and secure.

Specs:
15"x12"x4" Gusset
Adjustable & Removable Strap
3 Inside Pockets
3 Brass, Nickel Plated Grommets
100% Cotton, Canvas
Large Tooth Zipper
Machine Washable, Cold & Air Dry

name: Metro Pop - The "Messenger", Orange Stripe
description:
Made in the U.S.A. – Metro Pop is a new line of products, by Top Shelf Totes. for those who want to bring their creative tools with them while on-the-go.

With a separate front pocket for carrying pens, pencils, brushes, knitting needles and other creative tools, we help keep things organized and clean.  

Inside the main compartment you can carry a 13″ laptop, tablet  and smartphone in various spaces, along with with sketch pads, notebooks and accessories.  An outside pocket on the back gives you a spot for items you need quick access to like boarding passes, subway tickets and badges.

Dimensions:

12"w x 14"h x 3" gusset

name: "Gadgety" - Chocolate Swirl
description:
Are you an on-the-go knitter who carries all kinds of gadgets with you?  Then our newest Yarn Pop will help you keep everything organized in one place. 

"Gadgety" Yarn Pop provides an interior zipper pocket to keep items separate.  Perfect for carrying a phone, needles and notions, this zipper pocket provides a second grommet with access to the outside world (great for headphones or even a second skein).

Use "Gadgety" Yarn Pop to:

- Organize your yarn and carry your gadgets safely tucked away in their own zipper pocket.
-  Carry phones, needles, extra yarn and anything else you want to have with you but separate from your main skein and project.
- Transport your project in your existing purse or bag easily. 
- Store yarn, needles and your pattern in one place while you have a Work In Progress.
- Stop using plastic zip bags for storage of yarn during projects.

Bags are made out of 100% cotton and are machine washable, and should be air dried. They can be lightly ironed when needed, as well. 

This bag is:

9"h x 9"w
100% Cotton Canvas - Exterior
100% Cotton - Interior
One Exterior Zipper
One Interior Zipper Pocket
Two nickel plated brass grommets (one on each side of the Yarn Pop)

**  Phone not included.

name: Yarn Pop - Green w/White Polka Dots (Double)
description:
- Do you have a hard time keeping your skeins organized while you knit or crochet?
- Have you ever used (or still use) plastic zip bags to hold your yarn?
- Do you want an easy way to keep your yarn organized and clean while being more eco friendly?

Yarn Pop [TM] will be your new favorite knitting accessory. 

Use Yarn Pop to:

- Organize your yarn when working on projects that require multiple skeins (different colors, two socks at a time, etc.) and require untangling of yarn frequently. You can easily 'throw' your skeins around and know they won't come undone or get tangled more.
- Protect your yarn from your pet. 
- Transport your project in your existing purse or bag easily. 
- Store yarn, needles and your pattern in one place while you have a Work In Progress.
- Stop using plastic zip bags for storage of yarn during projects.

Bags are made out of 100% cotton and are machine washable, and should be air dried. They can be lightly ironed when needed, as well. 

This bag is:

8.5"h x 11.25"w
100% Cotton Canvas - Exterior
100% Cotton - Interior
One zipper
Two nickel plated brass grommets

- Store yarn, needles and your pattern in one place while you have a Work In Progress.
- Stop using plastic zip bags for storage of yarn during projects.

Bags are made out of 100% cotton and are machine washable, and should be air dried. They can be lightly ironed when needed, as well. 

This bag is:

8"x8"
100% Cotton Canvas - Exterior
100% Cotton - Interior
One zipper
One nickel plated brass grommet

name: "Single" - Chocolate Swirl
description:
- Do you have a hard time keeping your skeins organized while you knit or crochet?
- Have you ever used (or still use) plastic zip bags to hold your yarn?
- Do you want an easy way to keep your yarn organized and clean while being more eco friendly?

Yarn Pop [TM] will be your new favorite knitting accessory. 

Use Yarn Pop to:

- Organize your yarn when working on projects that require multiple skeins (different colors, two socks at a time, etc.) and require untangling of yarn frequently. You can easily 'throw' your skeins around and know they won't come undone or get tangled more.
- Protect your yarn from your pet. 
- Transport your project in your existing purse or bag easily.

name: The "Commuter" - Bright Flowers
description:
The "Commuter" was made with the on-the-go knitter in mind. Needles (straight and circular) will stay secure in the elastic spaces and mobile tablets (iPad/Kindle/Android) stay secure in a sleeve that allows touch functionality to be used right through the plastic.  

Microsuede keeps needles and tablets protected on the inside. Foam core padding keeps tablets and needles safe from the outside.

Use the elastic area to hold Knitting Needles, Crochet Needles, Darning Needles and even small Scissors.  

Cases are:

8.75"x11.25"
Cotton Canvas - Exterior
Microsuede (no animal products) - Interior
Full zipper closure

name: Metro Pop - The "Messenger", B&W Lattice
description:
Made in the U.S.A. – Metro Pop is a new line of products, by Top Shelf Totes. for those who want to bring their creative tools with them while on-the-go.

With a separate front pocket for carrying pens, pencils, brushes, knitting needles and other creative tools, we help keep things organized and clean.  

Inside the main compartment you can carry a 13″ laptop, tablet  and smartphone in various spaces, along with with sketch pads, notebooks and accessories.  An outside pocket on the back gives you a spot for items you need quick access to like boarding passes, subway tickets and badges.

Dimensions:

12"w x 14"h x 3" gusset

name: Yarn Pop - Carabiner
description:
For those times you want to hook your Yarn Pop to something while your knitting, this carabiner will come in handy!

- Walk and knit?  Hook your Yarn Pop to your belt loop or purse strap.
- Knit on the plane/train?  Hook your Yarn Pop to your carry-on.

The Keychain loop easily attaches to the zipper on your Yarn Pop and the Carabiner can be used to attach your Yarn Pop anywhere.  It provides an ergonomic way to knit and walk, and gives you versatility because you can easily attach it and remove it from your Yarn Pop.

**  Please note, this carabiner is not intended for use in any climbing activities.  **

name: Yarn Pop - Handle
description: This handle can be put on the zipper when you need it and removed when you don't.  It is a clean and easy way to give yourself added functionality to the Yarn Pop without lots of bulk.

name: Little Buddy
description:
We saw this product and thought, "Adoralble!"  It is perfect for holding your earbuds when they aren't in use.  

We are all about gadgets around here, and we always complain about our earbuds getting tangled. The Little Buddy makes earbuds behave while not in use, and makes it quick and easy to use earbuds when you want. 

Great addition to a "Gadgety" Yarn Pop!  You can carry your phone and earbuds with your knitting, but in a separate pocket. 

** Earbuds not included.

name: Turquoise Owls "Double" & Soak Bundle
description:
Very limited quantities of this bundle.  What you get:

1 - "Double" Turquoise Owls Yarn Pop
1 - Soak wash, 14oz.
1 - Handmaid lotion, 3oz.

** Please note, the Soak wash and Handmaid lotion may not be what is in the picture. 

---

This bundle makes a great gift for any of your knitting/crocheting friends.  With a "Double" Yarn Pop and great Soak products, you have everything you need for taking care of your projects - start to finish.

name: Green Dots & Stripes "Double" & Soak Bundle

---

name: Pink Giraffe Yarn Pop ("Single") & Cheerio Necklace Bundle
description: We love the new Cheerio kit from Nelkin Designs and think it pairs perfectly with the "Single" Yarn Pop. Available in limited quantities right now, this bundle gives you everything you need to work on your Cheerio project while on-the-go. This makes a perfect gift for your knitting friends (or yourself!). Choose the Cheerio color you want to pair with your chosen Yarn Pop "Single" below. "Single" Yarn Pop 8"x8" 100% Cotton Canvas - Exterior 100% Cotton - Interior One zipper One nickel plated brass grommet Cheerio Necklace Kit Included In Kit 14 yards fingering weight yarn -- Shibul Staccato (70% superwash merino, 30% silk) 68 Size 8 Triangular glass seed beads (bead A) 176 Size 8 round glass seed beads (bead B) 5 Czech glass Cheerio beads (bead C) Dental floss threader Snap clasp Materials Needed US Size 2 (2.75mm) needles Sewing thread and needle to sew on clasp Finished Measurements 18 inches around by 1 inch at widest point Choose the Cheerio Kit colorway you'd like to bundle with your Pink Giraffe Yarn Pop:
